description: This file defines a React functional component named EntityForm, which renders a flexible, controlled form UI for creating or editing entities based on provided fields and values. It supports custom rendering, validation error display, and different input types, intended for use in a larger React project.

methods.name: EntityForm({ fields = [], values = {}, onChange, errors = {} })
methods.description: A React functional component that renders a dynamic form based on provided field definitions, values, and change handler.
